sentences.en: Astronomers know that Pluto and Triton have nearly the same size, mass, and density.
sentences.cn: 天文学家知道冥王星与海卫一拥有几乎相同的体积、质量与密度。

sentences.en: In the Greek mysteries, Persephone , abducted by Pluto , Lord of Hades.
sentences.cn: 在希腊神秘主义中, 珀尔塞福涅(腊神话中的宙斯之女)冥神绑架.

sentences.en: It is all because, compared with Neptune, Pluto is very small.
sentences.cn: 而和海王星比起来, 冥王星体积又太小.

sentences.en: Now it would be possible to discover many new things about Pluto.
sentences.cn: 现在,就有可能发现许多有关冥王星的新事物.

sentences.en: Of or relating to the god Pluto or the underworld; infernal.
sentences.cn: 普路托的,阴间的:普路托的或阴间的;与之有关的; 阴森的.
冥王星的轨道是椭圆形的.

sentences.en: Pluto has been demoted because it does not dominate its neighborhood.
sentences.cn: 冥王星被降级是因为它无法支配它的邻居.

sentences.en: Pluto has widely been considered a planet since its discovery in 1930.
sentences.cn: 自从1930年发现冥王星以来,就普遍认定它是一颗行星.

sentences.en: Pluto is finally getting some respect - not from astronomers, but from wordsmiths.
sentences.cn: 冥王星最终被给予些许敬意,但 非 来自天文学家, 而是语言艺术家.

sentences.en: Pluto seems to have suffered a major collision that tipped it 122 degrees from the vertical.
sentences.cn: 冥王星似乎受到过严重撞击，倾斜了122度。

sentences.en: The findings will appear in the Astrophysical Journal Letters. Now onto Pluto.
sentences.cn: 研究结果将刊登在《天体物理学杂志》. 现在在冥王星.

sentences.en: The reign of Pluto, which spreads beneath our burning fields , seems rent with unseen commotion.
sentences.cn: 普路同在我们炽热的大地下面的权势似乎被看不见的混乱粉碎了.

sentences.en: The space telescope has taken the clearest pictures ever of Pluto.
sentences.cn: 太空望远镜拍摄到了迄今为止最清晰的冥王星的照片。

sentences.en: There are at least two objects of a similar size to Pluto.
sentences.cn: 其中至少有2颗天体和冥王星的体积差不多.

sentences.en: Uranus, Neptune and Pluto are never visible to the naked eye.
sentences.cn: 天王星 、 海王星和冥王星肉眼从来都不会看到.

words.tran_cn: 冥王星的；冥界的；深成岩的

trans.tran_cn: pipe line under the ocean 海底输油管（第二次世界大战时英国在北海为盟军铺设的输油管）

trans.tran_en: the god of the underworld; Hades
